title: if you could play all 5 roles simultaneously, what rank would you end up?
body:
Assume you are indiviually controlling each champion and the other 4 yous would be like random teammates that act identically to what you would do and choose the champs that you do.

I do decent in every role, but I don't really have a main role anymore... I just thought it'd be interesting to think what elo I'd be if my teammates always did exactly what I would do in game.
